SECTION_CONTENT:
Wear personal protective equipment. Use only under a chemical fume hood. Do not get in
eyes, on skin, or on clothing. Do not breathe dust. Do not ingest.
Keep containers tightly closed in a dry, cool and well-ventilated place. Corrosives area.
